column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////By the time the seafood paella arrived after ~20 minutes
column2: we were stuffed with tapas. I barely made a dent in my portion
column3: which was pretty large. It's hard to say if it was because I was quite full or not
column4: but I was not as impressed with the paella as I was with the tapas. The dish could have used a bit more flavor and the rice seemed a bit undercooked
column5: which makes sense given it arrived at our table earlier than the waiter originally said it would. However
column6: the calamari in the paella was of very high quality and I enjoyed it a lot!
